at.qe.sepm.skeleton.repositories

Interface AbstractRepository<T,ID extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The domain type this repository manages.
    ID - The type of the id of the entity this repository manages.
    All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<T,ID>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    UserRepository

    @NoRepositoryBean
public interface AbstractRepository<T,ID extends java.io.Serializable>
extends org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<T,ID>
    Common base repository for all other repositories. Provides basic methods for loading, saving and removing entities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(T entity)
      Deletes an entity.
      java.util.List<T> findAll()
      Returns all instances of the type.
      T findOne(ID id)
      Retrieves an entity by its id.
      <S extends T>
      S      		 save(S entity)
      Saves a given entity.

    • Method Detail

      • delete

        void delete(T entity)
        Deletes an entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to be deleted.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given entity is (@literal null}.

      • findAll

        java.util.List<T> findAll()
        Returns all instances of the type.
        Returns:
        All entities.

      • findOne

        T findOne(ID id)
        Retrieves an entity by its id.
        Parameters:
        id - must not be null.
        Returns:
        The entity with the given id or null if none found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If id is null.

      • save

        <S extends T> S save(S entity)
        Saves a given entity. Use the returned instance for further operations as the save operation might have changed the entity instance completely.
        Type Parameters:
        S - The actual domain type if the entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to be saved or updated.
        Returns:
        The saved entity.
